name: ChurchKidsStories
0:
”Alexa, open church kids stories”
”Alexa, ask church kids stories for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start church kids stories”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: church kids stories
des: ChurchKids, the children’s ministry of Churchome, provides Biblical and faith-based stories for kids, inviting parent participation with a relaxing sleep sound. ChurchKids Stories are now available on Alexa-enabled devices! Just ask Alexa! “Alexa, open ChurchKids Stories.” Tuck your kids in with ChurchKids Stories and end the day with stories that bring faith and encouragement to the family night.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
